name: VIBRATION
description:
• Vibration is a first person stealth game in which you play as a fugitive slave. A miner whose ancestors were locked in caves for so long that they no longer possess their eyes. Using only echolocation you must sneak your way out of the prison. See all the sounds.
  • Distract enemies and don't let them hear you. They are relentless and will chase you without end if they discover you. Every move you make can be heard. Move carefully.
  • Find and pick up all the statuettes hidden throughout the level. Be observant.
  • Controls:
    Game is designed for keyboard&mouse and the description of controls is accessible from the main menu of the game.
  • Disclaimer:
    • This is my first bigger project and it can probably be felt in the game.I would be really glad to hear all the feedback and opinions so I can keep improving!
    Finishing the game should take around 30 minutes.
